text: @realDonaldTrump You have zero to do w/stock market. And despite gains; I assume you take responsibility for record losses in stock market under your watch, that far outweigh gains in your 3+ years as WH occupant❗️Coronavirus continues to attack🇺🇸yet you still refuse to lead❗️😡🚫🤥Trump🚫un🇺🇸GOP
